mg_menu0.content: Choose me or one of my friends to create a musical garden about how we're feeling!

mg_menu1.content: Choose a mood for your musical garden!

mg_menu_idle_alt.content: Tap the arrow to see even more choices!

mg_menu_checkmark.content: Tap the checkmark when you're ready to play!

mg_tutorial_intro.content: Welcome to my musical garden! I'm so happy you're here!

mg_intro1.content: Can you make a pinkatastic song that makes you feel happy?

mg_intro2.content: Pinkalicious got glitter on my painting and ruined it, so I'm feeling a little mad.
Can you make a song that sounds mad?

mg_intro3.content: (giggles) There's a silly feeling in the air!
What song will put you in a silly mood too?

mg_intro4.content: I'm feeling…(sigh)…I've got a case of the blues.
Will you make a song to go with my sad feeling?

mg_intro5.content: Mmm, this garden is so calm and peaceful today!
Will you make a song that makes you feel calm too?

mg_intro6.content: I'm in a happy mood after playing with my dog, Rusty!
Can you make a song that makes you feel happy?

mg_intro7.content: Peter didn't play fairly at mini golf, and that put me in a grumpy mood.
How could you make a song that sounds like that?

mg_intro8.content: Doop-badoop-boop! I love making silly noises!
Can you make a song that sounds silly?

mg_intro9.content: Ooh! Valentine's Day gives me a feeling of love!
Can you make a song that make you feel happy and full of love too?

mg_flower_pink.content: Tap one of these flowers to hear the sound it makes,
then tap some empty spots in the garden to start making your song!

mg_flower_happy_pink.content: Add some flowers to make your happy song!

mg_flower_more.content: Pinkamazing! Add more flowers to make the rest of your song!

mg_flower_different.content: You can tap another flower to choose a different sound to add!

mg_play_pink.content: When you're ready to hear your song, tap the play button!

mg_prompt0_mad_rafael.content: What do you think will make this song sound mad?

mg_prompt0_mad_rafael_alt0.content: What do you think will give this song a mad feeling?

mg_prompt0_mad_rafael_alt1.content: Can you make a mad sounding song for me?

mg_prompt0_silly_jasmine.content: Do these sounds make you feel silly?

mg_prompt0_sad_peter.content: Which sounds seem like sad sounds to you?

mg_prompt0_calm_jasmine.content: Which sounds are making you feel calm?

mg_prompt0_happy_rafael.content: Do these sounds put you in a happy mood?

mg_prompt0_grumpy_pink.content: What do you think will make this song sound grumpy or mad?

mg_prompt0_silly_peter.content: Do these sounds put you in a silly mood?

mg_prompt0_vday_pink.content: What do you think will make this song sound happy?

mg_prompt1_pink.content: Songs feel different with one kind of sound or many! What does your song have?

mg_prompt1_peter.content: Songs feel different with one kind of sound or many! What does your song have?

mg_prompt1_jasmine.content: Songs feel different with one kind of sound or many! What does your song have?

mg_prompt1_rafael.content: Songs feel different with one kind of sound or many! What does your song have?

mg_prompt2_pink.content: What happens to the sound if you put a flower in a higher or lower spot? Try it!

mg_prompt2_jasmine.content: What happens to the sound if you put a flower in a higher or lower spot? Try it!

mg_prompt2_rafael.content: What happens to the sound if you put a flower in a higher or lower spot? Try it!

mg_prompt3_pink_alt.content: Have you tried leaving empty spots in your garden? That creates a different rhythm or mood. Tap a flower in your garden to take it out.

mg_prompt3_pink.content: Have you tried leaving empty spots in your garden?
That creates a different rhythm or mood.

mg_prompt3_peter_alt.content: Have you tried leaving empty spots in your garden? That creates a different rhythm or mood. Tap a flower in your garden to take it out.

mg_prompt3_peter.content: Have you tried leaving empty spots in your garden?
That creates a different rhythm or mood.

mg_prompt3_jasmine_alt.content: Have you tried leaving empty spots in your garden? That creates a different rhythm or mood. Tap a flower in your garden to take it out.

mg_prompt3_jasmine.content: Have you tried leaving empty spots in your garden?
That creates a different rhythm or mood.

mg_prompt3_rafael_alt.content: Have you tried leaving empty spots in your garden? That creates a different rhythm or mood. Tap a flower in your garden to take it out.

mg_prompt4_pink.content: Do any of the flowers sound like instruments you know?

mg_prompt4_peter.content: Do any of the flowers sound like instruments you know?

mg_prompt4_jasmine.content: Do any of the flowers sound like instruments you know?

mg_prompt4_rafael.content: Do any of the flowers sound like instruments you know?

mg_positive0_mad_rafael.content: I love the sounds you're picking!

mg_positive1_mad_rafael.content: Great garden! See if you can try a bunch of different flowers!

mg_positive0_happy_rafael.content: I love the sounds you're picking!

mg_positive1_happy_rafael.content: Great garden! See if you can try a bunch of different flowers!

mg_reaction_happy_pink.content: I love this song! Does it make you feel happy too?

mg_buttons.content: Tap here if you want to work on your song some more!
Or tap here to make a new musical garden!

mg_reaction0_mad_rafael.content: Ooh! Does this song put you in a mad mood? Why?

mg_reaction0_silly_jasmine.content: Does this song make you want to do a silly dance? Try it!

mg_reaction0_sad_peter.content: Does your song make you feel blue?

mg_reaction0_calm_jasmine.content: What makes this song sound calm and relaxing to you?

mg_reaction0_happy_rafael.content: Your song makes me happy, how about you?
Does it make you want to dance around?

mg_reaction0_grumpy_pink.content: Wow! Does this song make you want to stomp your feet?

mg_reaction0_silly_peter.content: Does this song make you laugh? What feels silly about it?

mg_reaction0_vday_pink.content: Pink, pink, hooray! Does this song make you want to sing out loud?

mg_reaction1_mad_rafael.content: Is there anything you want to change to help your song sound mad?

mg_reaction1_silly_jasmine.content: Is there anything you want to change to help your song sound silly?

mg_reaction1_sad_peter.content: Is there anything you want to change to help your song sound sad?

mg_reaction1_calm_jasmine.content: Is there anything you want to change to help your song sound calm?

mg_reaction1_happy_rafael.content: Is there anything you want to change to help your song sound happy?

mg_reaction1_grumpy_pink.content: Is there anything you want to change to help your song sound grumpy?

mg_reaction1_silly_peter.content: Is there anything you want to change to help your song sound silly?

mg_reaction1_vday_pink.content: Is there anything you want to change to help your song sound happy?

mg_reaction2_pink.content: Do you want to change your flowers and make your song sound different?

mg_reaction2_peter.content: Do you want to change your flowers and make your song sound different?

mg_reaction2_jasmine.content: Do you want to change your flowers and make your song sound different?

mg_reaction2_rafael.content: Do you want to change your flowers and make your song sound different?

mg_reaction3_pink.content: What happens if you use other flower sounds?

mg_reaction3_peter.content: What happens if you use other flower sounds?

mg_reaction3_jasmine.content: What happens if you use other flower sounds?

mg_reaction3_rafael.content: What happens if you use other flower sounds?

mg_reaction4_pink.content: Does your song have any empty spots?
Adding or taking away flowers can change the rhythm and mood of your song.

mg_reaction4_peter.content: Does your song have any empty spots?
Adding or taking away flowers can change the rhythm and mood of your song.

mg_reaction4_jasmine.content: Does your song have any empty spots?

mg_reaction4_rafael.content: Does your song have any empty spots?

mg_celebration_silly_jasmine.content: (giggles) This is a fun song to listen to!

mg_celebration_sad_peter.content: This is a really nice song!

mg_celebration_calm_jasmine.content: I love the song you're making!

mg_celebration_happy_rafael.content: I love listening to your song!

mg_celebration_silly_peter.content: I could listen to this song all day!

mg_feedback_happy_pink.content: Your song made me feel pinkatastic!
I hope it made you happy too!

mg_feedback_mad_rafael.content: Great song! I feel a little better after hearing your music!

mg_feedback_silly_jasmine.content: (laughs) Awesome! I'm feeling even sillier now!

mg_feedback_sad_peter.content: Wow! I don't have the blues anymore after listening to your song!

mg_feedback_calm_jasmine.content: Ahhh, that was a nice song to hear!

mg_feedback_happy_rafael.content: Hooray! That was an awesome musical garden!

mg_feedback_grumpy_pink.content: Wow! I feel a bit better after hearing your music!

mg_feedback_silly_peter.content: (laughs) Incredible! That was a fun musical garden!

mg_feedback_vday_pink.content: Pinkaperfect! That was a beautiful song!
